Scripts.OnEnter:
self.closeButton:Show() if not self:IsDragging() then local T = Angleur_Translate GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMLEFT", 45) local colorBlu = CreateColor(0.61, 0.85, 0.92) local colorWhite = CreateColor(1, 1, 1) if AngleurCharacter.sleeping == false then GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Angleur Visual Button"], 0.6, 0.85, 0.91) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Shows what your next key press
will do. Not meant to be clicked."], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(" ") if AngleurConfig.chosenMethod == "doubleClick" then GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Fishing Mode: " .. colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Double Click
")], 1, 1, 1) elseif AngleurConfig.chosenMethod == "oneKey" then GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Fishing Mode: " .. colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("One Key")], 1, 1, 1) if AngleurConfig.angleurKey then GameTooltip:AddLine(colorWhite:WrapTextInColorCode(T["Key set to "]) .. AngleurConfig.angleurKey .. "
 ") else GameTooltip:AddLine(T["One-Key NOT SET! To set,
open config menu with:"], 1, 0, 0, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("/angleur") GameTooltip:AddLine(T[" or
"], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine("/angang
 ") end end GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Right Click to temporarily put Angleur to sleep. zzz..."], 0.8, 0.8, 0.8, true) elseif AngleurCharacter.sleeping == true then GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Sleeping. Zzz...
"], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T[colorWhite:WrapTextInColorCode("
Equip a ") .. "Fishing Pole
"]) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["
or"], 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["
Right-Click"]) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["
to wake Angleur!"], 1, 1, 1, true) self.sleep:SetPoint("TOPRIGHT", "GameTooltip", "TOPRIGHT", -15, 0) self.sleep:Show() end GameTooltip:Show() end
Scripts.OnLeave: if not self:IsMouseOver() then self.closeButton:Hide() end GameTooltip:Hide() if self.sleep:IsShown() then self.sleep:Hide() end
Scripts.OnClick:
if button == "RightButton" and down == true then if InCombatLockdown() then print(Angleur_Translate["Can't change sleep state in combat."]) return end local colorBlu = CreateColor(0.61, 0.85, 0.92) if AngleurCharacter.sleeping == true then AngleurCharacter.sleeping = false Angleur_SetSleep() Angleur_EquipAngleurSet(true) print(colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Angleur: ") .. "Awake.") elseif AngleurCharacter.sleeping == false then AngleurCharacter.sleeping = true Angleur_SetSleep() Angleur_UnequipAngleurSet() print(colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Angleur: ") .. "Sleeping.") end
end

Scripts.OnLeave: if not self:GetParent():IsMouseOver() then self:Hide() end

Scripts.OnMouseDown: self:Raise() if Angleur.visual:IsShown() then Angleur.visual:Raise() end
Scripts.OnDragStart: self:StartMoving() if Angleur.visual:IsShown() then Angleur.visual:Raise() end
Scripts.OnDragStop: self:StopMovingOrSizing() if Angleur.visual:IsShown() then Angleur.visual:Raise() end
Scripts.OnShow: if AngleurCharacter.sleeping == true then self.wakeUpButton:Show() self.wakeUpButton.sleep:Show() end

Scripts.OnEnter:
if not self:IsDragging() then local T = Angleur_Translate local colorBlu = CreateColor(0.61, 0.85, 0.92) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMLEFT", 45) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["One-Key Fishing Mode"], 1.0, 0.82, 0.0, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Cast ") .. ", " .. colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Reel ") .. "and " .. colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("use Items and Configured Macros ") .. "using 
one button.", 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Note for Classic:"]) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Mouseover the bobber
to reel consistently."], 1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["(If it lands too far, the
soft-interact will miss it.)"], 0.8, 0.8, 0.8) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnShow: if AngleurConfig.chosenMethod == "oneKey" and not AngleurConfig.angleurKey then Angleur.configPanel.tab1.contents.fishingMethod.oneKey.contents.angleurKey.warning:Show() end

Scripts.OnEnter: if not self:IsDragging() then local T = Angleur_Translate local colorBlu = CreateColor(0.61, 0.85, 0.92) GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMRIGHT", -45) GameTooltip:AddLine(T["Double-Click Fishing Mode"], 1.0, 0.82, 0.0, true) GameTooltip:AddLine(T[colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("Cast ") .. "your rod and " .. colorBlu:WrapTextInColorCode("use Items/Macros ") .. "using\ndouble mouse clicks!\n"], 1, 1, 1, true) GameTooltip:Show() end

Scripts.OnClick: if AngleurConfig.visualHidden == true then Angleur_VisualReset(self, -75, -2, true) Angleur_CreateWeaponSwapFrames() self:Hide() end
if InCombatLockdown() then return end ToggleCharacter("PaperDollFrame")
if InCombatLockdown() then return end if not MacroFrame then C_AddOns.LoadAddOn("Blizzard_MacroUI") MacroFrame_Show() elseif not MacroFrame:IsShown() then MacroFrame_Show() end
if InCombatLockdown() then print(Angleur_Translate["Can't change sleep state in combat."]) return end AngleurCharacter.sleeping = false Angleur_SetSleep() Angleur_EquipAngleurSet(true)
if InCombatLockdown() then return end self:Disable() Angleur_CreateEquipmentSet()
Scripts.OnEnter:
GameTooltip:SetOwner(self, "ANCHOR_BOTTOMLEFT", 70) local colorWhite = CreateColor(1, 1, 1) GameTooltip:AddLine(Angleur_Translate["Beta: " .. colorWhite:WrapTextInColorCode("If you are having trouble,
try resetting the set by clicking
the reset button then refreshing
the UI with ") .. "/reload."], 1.0, 0.82, 0.0) GameTooltip:Show()

Scripts.OnLoad: tinsert(UISpecialFrames, self:GetName()) self.TitleText:SetText(Angleur_Translate["Angleur Warning: Plater"]) self.mainText:SetText(Angleur_Translate["Make sure this box is checked!"]) local colorYellow = CreateColor(1.0, 0.82, 0.0) self.okayButton:SetText(colorYellow:WrapTextInColorCode(Angleur_Translate["Okay"]))
Scripts.OnHide: if C_AddOns.IsAddOnLoaded("Plater") then Plater.OpenOptionsPanel(23, true) end
